column3: (Can be reviewed as GitHub rich diff)

IMO, the underline syntax for headers is easier to read when reading the text instead of formatted version, this is, as far as i know, why we've always stuck with that.\n\nACK on removing unnecessary downgrading instructions.
nit :s/that reached its/that has reached its
nit: s/some time in case the datadir needs to be migrated in the background./some time if the datadir needs to be migrated.
